95268.<pc>は 週刊ウルベア魔神兵１巻に\n付属しているブ厚い箱の 上部に貼りついた:
looks through the thin booklet attached to the top of the thick box that came with Urbea Aztech Weekly Volume 1.
According to the booklet, a real Urbea Aztech's head contains an artificial intelligence that allows autonomous behavior.
Experiments were conducted using advanced artificial intelligence to mediate between organizations and arbitrate between spouses.
But for some reason, the former succeeded and the latter failed.

95530.<pc>は 週刊ウルベア魔神兵２巻に\n付属しているブ厚い箱の 上部に貼りついた:
looks through the thin booklet attached to the top of the thick box that came with Urbea Aztech Weekly Volume 2.
According to the booklet, a real Urbea Aztech's right arm is equipped with a beam cannon that shoots a high powered beam.
Observed information says that the beam was fired at the moon during the start of the year, and caused a new crater to form!

95776.<pc>は 週刊ウルベア魔神兵３巻に\n付属しているブ厚い箱の 上部に貼りついた:
looks through the thin booklet attached to the top of the thick box that came with Urbea Aztech Weekly Volume 3.
According to the booklet, a real Urbea Aztech's left arm is equipped with a huge axe, but can also be attached with a beam cannon.
Aztechs programmed with warlike AI tend to prefer the axe for close quarters, and the beam cannon for ranged support.
At the front lines where equipment is in short supply, records say that Aztechs would fight over one axe until they were destroyed.

96138.<pc>は 週刊ウルベア魔神兵４巻に\n付属しているブ厚い箱の 上部に貼りついた:
looks through the thin booklet attached to the top of the thick box that came with Urbea Aztech Weekly Volume 4.
According to the booklet, a real Urbea Aztech's torso has a mysterious space inside it where people can enter.
It seems there was a plan to freeze and store bodies inside the Aztechs, which this space is a remnant of.
Some Aztechs specialize in food transportation since they can store meat and vegetables in this space longer than at room temperature.

96471.<pc>は 週刊ウルベア魔神兵５巻に\n付属しているブ厚い箱の 上部に貼りついた:
looks through the thin booklet attached to the top of the thick box that came with Urbea Aztech Weekly Volume 5.
According to the booklet, a real Urbea Aztech's legs use an anti-gravity technology, and will not fall on even the roughest roads.
The Minister of Finance consulted with the Empire Tech Agency and asked, "If they can float, do they need legs?" to curb war costs.
The proposal was considered interfering and was met with opposition from the Tech Agency which scrapped the proposal immediately.
As a result, the Minister of Finance was forced to resign, after which he sent to the front lines and died honorably in the war...

96867.<pc>は 週刊ウルベア魔神兵６巻に\n付属しているブ厚い箱の 上部に貼りついた:
looks through the thin booklet attached to the top of the thick box that came with Urbea Aztech Weekly Volume 6.
According to the booklet, a real Urbea Aztech's legs use a hovering function to dramatically shorten travel time.
This hovering is useful for retreating battles if needed. However, malfunctions in AI caused some to go behind enemy lines and not return.
Theories say the fugitive Aztechs are waiting to take revenge on their creator, who started an irrational war from the village he built...

97234.<pc>は 透明な包みに おおわれた\nエッチな本を 胸に抱きしめてみた。\n<:

can clearly feel the hot blood rushing through ther entire body and deep into their chest.

97514.<pc>は ギザ縁ウルベアめんこを\nじっくり ながめてみた。\n<br>\nウ:

100170.１番 ラランラ～♪ \n山肌をなでる熱～ 鳥の目に映る赤～\n身を焦がし もだえ:

our statuses did not matter at all."
"We made love, and soon had a daughter. I gave them a house near the castle for them to live in. They lived in modest happiness."
"But...Myna died. The Time Guidebook told her to kill herself for the future of Ethene."
"I suspected it was the king's doing. Father was not fond of Myna. Did he tamper with the guidelines to send her to her death?"
"So, I secretly consulted the Timeseer Box. However, it was revealed that not even the king could tamper with the prophecy."
"Fate can be so cruel... did her death bring about a better future? Did she really have to die?!"
"Only the Timeseer Box understood my pain. I followed the guidelines, met the princess, and eventually, my interest in Myna and her
daughter faded away..."

114970.<pc>は ポケットかばんを\n手に取って ながめてみた。\n<br>\n大小:

115769.<pc>は 軍旗の宝玉があった\n『異界への進軍』という絵画に\n添えられていた:

1. Ogreed: Lion Gate 2. Eltona: Sunset Meadow 3. Dwachakka: Raniakka Fault Zone
4. Wena Islands: Sleeping Wisdom Ruins 5. Pukuland: Orphea
Once you reach one of the continents, it's best to hold up the Light Pot to confirm the continent you're on is the correct one.
After that, continuing to use the Light Pot will help you reach your destination.

"You sometimes visit this beacon for shopping and rest, and you were always comfortable chatting with us guards."
"However, I was very concerned when I saw that you were acting differently than usual the other day when you visited us."
"Because I fell in love with you at first sight."
"Please feel free to talk to me anytime you like. I look forward to hearing from you!"

159124.<pc>は\n傷だらけの手帳を 読んでみた。\n<br>\n私は 天使ノーニウス:
reads the Scratched Notebook.
"I am the angel Nornius. I am on a mission to investigate the chaos created by Master Nadraga."
"During the investigation, I encountered a giant dragon with great power. After the battle, I succeeded in sealing it, but I
was deeply wounded, and I don't think I'll be able to hold out much longer."
"If anyone reads this, I have a favor to ask. I want you to deliver this notebook and the Sea Medal to my lover, Temoria, in Fourion."
"Temoria. I really wish I could tell you in my own voice, but I will leave my final thoughts in writing."
"You're a much stronger angel than I. I hope you'll continue to use your power for the sake of Lutiana and the people of the New World."
"Temoria...even though you can't see me, my spirit will be with you. So please don't cry."
